Enter your OpenRouter API key: Enter your OpenRouter API key (Get at: openrouter.ai/keys)
Enter your Gemini API key: Enter your Gemini API key (Get at: aistudio.google.com/apikey)
Click refresh: Click refresh to get available models
Image optimization desc: Compress images before sending to AI to save tokens and improve transmission efficiency.
System prompt for text chat mode: System prompt for text chat mode
System prompt for edit mode: Role and style settings for edit mode. JSON output format is handled automatically.
System prompt for node mode (leave empty: System prompt for node mode (leave empty to use default built-in prompt)
Override color for generated nodes (1-6,: Override color for generated nodes (1-6, leave empty to use AI suggested colors)
System prompt for image generation mode: System prompt for image generation mode
Double click image to open desc: Double-click an image node to open it in a new popout window
Single window mode desc: Reuse the same popup window when opening images instead of creating new windows
Data storage: Data is stored in your vault config folder
Enable manual model: Enable to manually enter model ID
No models available: No models available, please refresh or enter manually
Placeholder Node Prompt: Leave empty to use default canvas JSON generation prompt...
Describe the image: Describe the image, or leave empty to use selected text...
Describe structure: Describe structure, or leave empty to use selected text...
Delete Preset Confirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
Please select preset delete: Please select a preset to delete
Please select preset save: Please select a preset to save
Please select preset rename: Please select a preset to rename
Copy Image to Clipboard Desc: Hotkey to copy selected image node to clipboard
Open AI Palette Desc: Hotkey to open the AI floating palette
Create New Node Desc: Hotkey to create a new text node at viewport center
Select Connected Nodes Desc: Select all nodes connected to the current selection
Select Child Nodes Desc: Select downstream nodes connected by outgoing edges
Image Generation Timeout Desc: Maximum wait time (in seconds) for image generation requests. Increase if you experience timeouts on slow connections.
Image generation timed out: Image generation timed out after {seconds} seconds. Please try again.
Model added: Model added to quick switch list
Model already exists: Model already in quick switch list
Model removed: Model removed from quick switch list
Found entity changes. Update all referen: Found entity changes. Update all references?
Max conversation turns desc: Maximum number of conversation turns to keep in sidebar context
Notes AI only works with markdown files: Full-text editing is only available for Markdown files. Please open a note to use this feature.
Edit disabled during image generation: Edit is disabled while images are generating
Image disabled during edit generation: Image is disabled while editing is in progress
Note floating icon desc: Show floating icon when text is selected in notes. Disable if you prefer using only the sidebar.
Generating image based on your request: Generating image based on your request
